# EntityHurtBeforeEvent Class

> [!CAUTION]
> This class is still in pre-release.  Its signature may change or it may be removed in future releases.

Contains information related to an entity that will be hurt.

## Properties

### **cancel**
`cancel: boolean;`

Type: *boolean*

### **damage**
`damage: number;`

Describes the amount of damage that will be caused.

Type: *number*

### **damageSource**
`read-only damageSource: EntityDamageSource;`

Source information on the entity that may have applied this damage.

Type: [*EntityDamageSource*](EntityDamageSource.md)

### **hurtEntity**
`read-only hurtEntity: Entity;`

Entity that will be hurt.

Type: [*Entity*](Entity.md)
